item.title: U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission
item.description: U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission Un document important.

item.title: Bureau fédéral d'enquête
item.description: Bureau fédéral d’enquête I am going to seek Victim Assistance and witness protection from the Federal Bureau of Investigation. I am going to explain in further details why later. I also intend to ask for witness protection to the European Court of Human Rights and to the Chinese Central Government. You can read my open letters to the F.B.I. on Federal-Bureau-of-Investigation.com (non-official website on the F.B.I.).
